metadata.title: CVE-2015-6783 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The FindStartOffsetOfFileInZipFile function in crazy_linker_zip.cpp incrazy_linker (aka Crazy Linker) in Android 5.x and 6.x, as used in GoogleChrome before 47.0.2526.73, improperly searches for an EOCD record, whichallows attackers to bypass a signature-validation requirement via a craftedZIP archive.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-6783` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 47.0.2526.73-0ubuntu0.14.04.1.1106
chromium-browser-l10n - 47.0.2526.73-0ubuntu0.14.04.1.1106
chromium-chromedriver - 47.0.2526.73-0ubuntu0.14.04.1.1106
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 47.0.2526.73-0ubuntu0.14.04.1.1106
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 47.0.2526.73-0ubuntu0.14.04.1.1106
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '47.0.2526.73-0ubuntu0.14.04.1.1106').
